description:
Summary:
From list of share accounts, I should be able to click each share account and view details of the account. However each link is not clickable.

Steps to reproduce:
Navigate to Accounts, Click Shares, Try to Click any Account from the List regardless of Status

Expected behavior:
Link successfully goes to the Account Details/Overview page

Observed behavior:
Not able to click the link.
name: Fix Bug : Can't View Account Details For Share Accounts
